name: Chili Caramel Glaze
description: Spicy and sweet caramel glaze perfect for topping crispy pork belly or mixing into a summery noodle salad.
keywords: Chili Caramel Glaze, Asian, Ingredient, Spicy, Sweet, Brown Sugar, Water, Lime Juice, Fish Sauce, Birdseye Chilis, Ginger, Garlic, Caramel, Glaze, Condiment, Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the brown sugar and water in a small pot over medium heat. Cook and stir until the mixture becomes a thick homogeneous mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the mixture to a boil and cook without stirring for about 6-8 minutes until the sugar caramelizes and darkens.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the lime juice and fish sauce, taking caution as it may spatter. Add the birdseye chilis, ginger, garlic, and lime zest. Cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the rest in

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat, strain and allow to cool. The chili caramel glaze is now ready to serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Strain and cool

notes: Absolutely fantastic over salads or crispy pork belly, or both!
